mapper.insert: insert into app_client_version_statistic() values(#{appId},#{clientIp},#{clientVersion},#{reportTime}) on duplicate key update client_version=#{clientVersion},report_time=#{reportTime}
mapper.select: select id, from app_client_version_statistic where client_ip=#{clientIp}
select id, from app_client_version_statistic where app_id=#{appId}

select id, from app_client_version_statistic where 1=1
and app_id=#{appId}
